dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1957
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A collection of stories: her daughter Tamar's search for a new farm, the gift of looms, a book by Eric Fromm on community, labor and civil rights picketing, her profession as a Benedictine oblate, and the injustice of Morton Sobell's trial for espionage with the Rosenbergs.
